title: Busy but impressive
text: Not surprising it was extremely crowded, even in the early morning. It still does not fail to make an impression.

title: Bussy one of the best monasteries
text: Lovely small monastery with exquisite clerical art. Slightly less crowded due to the climb up. Try to get there early to avoid the crowds a bit.

title: Great food and friendly
text: A typical greek dinner with a quality level that stands out. The oven dishes are very good and should not be missed.

title: Great atmosphere and value for money
text: We had a great stay at Archontico hotel. Georgos and his wife are most helpful hosts and the hotel has a lovely atmosphere. The breakfast is good, the terras overlooking the value is great and the family rooms are the best. The pool is a bit cold but and the bathrooms could be upgraded but those were the only improvements we could think of. We had a marvellous stay and we hope to be back!

title: Good service that may be improved
text: At 08:00 in Aug. there is already a long line so it feels great to skip that. The ticket needs to be picked up first in the city, which is a bit of a hassle. It would be better if the ticket could be provided online as download.
place: Skip the Line: Acropolis of Athens Admission Ticket
